title: The Little King - Novel Updates

tags: Ancient China   Arranged Marriage   Clingy Lover   Cross-dressing   Doting Love Interests   First-time Interc**rse   Forced Marriage   Futanari   Heartwarming   Indecisive Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Male Yandere   Mpreg   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Power Struggle   Wars   Weak Protagonist   Weak to Strong   Younger Love Interests
author: As Distant As The White Clouds   远上白云间
description:
Tensions between the Kingdom of Xia and the Northwest Barbarians rise as they continue to fight on the border. To maintain a fragile alliance, the ‘Princess’ of peace Xia Xi was gifted as a tribute.

He thought that the Barbarian King he was supposed to marry was a very old man, but he didn’t expect it to be a hairy boy five years younger than him.

This is a story in which the little wolf grows up and eats his belated meal thoroughly.>
